Muscle Metrics
Lift smarter so you can lift harder
Our Mission
Muscle Metrics leverages today's technology to help track and plan the most important aspects of your workout routine in order to make your gym experience as hassle free and seamless as possible. We believe the most challanging thing you should be doing at the gym is working out.

Our intelligent hardware tracks your workout activity automatically

View, plan, and guage your workout progress seemlessly on your mobile device

Obtain powerful analytics on every facet of your workout for yourself and gym personnel

Hardware
  • Track and record repititions, sets and weight lifted automatically
  • Attachable onto any dumbbell, freeweight, or barbell
  • Modular design allows for easy repair and battery replacement
  • LED indicator for visual aid
Mobile

Muscle Metrics is the all-in-one solution for tracking your workout progress seamlessly and in real time. Passive connection of nearby hardware allows for workout activity to be updated in the mobile interface immediately and with zero effort on behalf of the user.

Simply plan your workout for the day, put your phone in your pocket, go about your routine activities and the information is automatically logged without you even having to touch your phone.

Share and export your workouts to other users or have the option to choose a set of predetermined or featured workouts to get you on the right track.

Analytics
  • Track members' workout routine to help reach personal fitness goals
  • Target specific customers for promotions and marketing
  • Provide personal virtual training and direct in-app communication with clients
  • View how often hardware is being used to invest in better equipment and not waste real estate
  • View other useful metrics like: time spent at facility, amenities used, client weight and bodyfat percentage progression, workout classes attended

Find out more!
